Base class of the many Strife keys (except [[Classes:OraclePass|OraclePass]] and [[Classes:PrisonPass|PrisonPass]] for some reason), only used to define some default properties. === [[ZScript]] definition === {{ZScriptDefinitionNote|actors/strife/strifekeys.zs}} class StrifeKey : Key { Default { Radius 20; Height 16; +NOTDMATCH +FLOORCLIP } } === [[DECORATE]] definition === {{DecorateDefinitionNote}} ACTOR StrifeKey : {{Class|Key}} { {{Property|Radius}} 20 {{Property|Height}} 16 +{{Flag|NOTDMATCH}} +{{Flag|FLOORCLIP}} }
